name: Nuclear Doughnut
description:
There was a leak in a nearby nuclear power plant. Iam not sure why, but the staff evolved to the very last thing they ate: DOUGHUTS! 

Science isn't sure why, but they are shooting Hotdogs, though.

THE DOUGHNUTS PLANTED A BOMB TO RULE OVER THE TOWN! YOU NEED TO KILL ALL DOUGHNUTS TO GET THE DEFUSECODES.

THERES NOT MUCH TIME LEFT. YOU'RE OUR LAST HOPE!

#All assets in this game will be and are made by myself!
